title: Hinano
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Japanese, Buffet, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Chain buffet restaurant, this one is at 北海道札幌市中央区北4条西2丁目1番地, on the 10th floor of the Touku department store by Sapporo station; can be accessed by the station's exit 13 or 14. Specializing in local Hokkaido food with many vegan alternatives as well healthier natural food. All-you-can-eat include drinks. Foods that include allergens (dairy, egg, soy, gluten) are marked in Japanese.
